localized title: Tu Bal Bramhachari Main Hoon Kanya Kunwari
title: Tu Bal Bramhachari Main Hoon Kanya Kunwari
akas: Tu Bal Bramhachari Main Hoon Kanya Kunwari (India)
plot: A father who believes a prophecy if he sees his child before he turns 20, then the child will survive. The child grows up in a religious facility and is celibate. His father wants him to marry so there is much plotting.
